data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Lorenzo Colombo (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 4, Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Marco Serra waits before resuming play because Daniele Verde for Spezia is still down.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniele Verde is back on the pitch.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan drives forward and Brahim Diaz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 12, Spezia's Daniele Verde gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Milan defender.
Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Spezia's half.
Milan to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 15, Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Milan are pushing forward but Simon Kjaer's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 18, Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Spezia's half.
Important block from the Spezia defence as Brahim Diaz fires in a strike for Milan.
Milan to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 20, Free kick Milan.
Throw-in Spezia.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Spezia.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Milan.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 31, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Milan.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andrey Galabinov.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Milan.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Spezia.
Matteo Ricci (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Andrey Galabinov, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Roberto Piccoli is the substitute for Spezia.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 35, At Giuseppe Meazza, Milan are penalized for being offside.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Milan drive upfield and Rafael Leao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spezia defender.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 39, Milan surge into the attack at Giuseppe Meazza but Rafael Leaoâ€™s header is off-target.
Spezia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 40, At Giuseppe Meazza, Emmanuel Gyasi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan.
Marco Serra awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Milan attack but Brahim Diaz's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 44, In Milan Milan attack through Alexis Saelemaekers. The finish is off target, however.
Marco Serra awards Spezia a goal kick.
Daniele Verde gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Marco Serra will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In the minute 45, Matteo Ricci for Spezia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan's Simon Kjaer is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Play has been interrupted briefly in Milan to check on Simon Kjaer, who is grimacing with pain.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
The home team replace Lorenzo Colombo with Hakan Calhanoglu.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 48, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Milan's area.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Milan's Brahim Diaz misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 52, Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Milan needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In the minute 54, Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Spezia's half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Rafael Leao scores to make it 1-0 at Giuseppe Meazza.
Great play from Hakan Calhanoglu to set up the goal.
In the minute 59, Spezia to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Stefano Pioli is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Ismael Bennacer replacing Rade Krunic.
In the minute 59, Franck Kessie is replacing Sandro Tonali for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a third substitution, with Kevin Agudelo replacing Daniele Verde.
The away team have replaced Matteo Ricci with Gennaro Acampora. This is the second substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Spezia in the half of Milan.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 66, Spezia's Kevin Agudelo is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Milan.
Free kick Spezia.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 69, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Throw-in Milan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Brahim Diaz with Jens Hauge. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Marco Serra awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 75, Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Goal! Milan extend their lead to 2-0 through Theo Hernandez.
In the minute 77, Spezia make their fourth substitution with Luca Mora replacing Tommaso Pobega.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a fifth substitution, with Paolo Bartolomei replacing Emmanuel Gyasi.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goal! Milan extend their lead to 3-0 through Rafael Leao.
Franck Kessie instrumental with a fine assist.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Milan's Theo Hernandez gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Milan.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick Milan.
In the minute 83, Stefano Pioli is making the team's fifth substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Daniel Maldini replacing Rafael Leao.
Throw-in Spezia.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
